\maketitle
\begin{abstract}
In this talk I discuss three different methods, using
$B_d\to J/\psi K_S$, $J/\psi K_S \pi^0$, $B_d\to K^-\pi^+, \pi^+\pi^-$
and $B_u\to K^- \pi^0, \bar K^0 \pi^-, \pi^-\pi^0$, to 
extract hadronic model independent 
information about new physics. 
\end{abstract}

\noindent
{\bf 1. Introduction
